functions.name: version
functions.notice: Semantic version of the Name Registry interface (e.g. b'1.0.0').

functions.name: exists
functions.notice: Returns true if a record for name exists.

functions.name: ownerOf
functions.notice: Returns the owner/controller address for the given name. Zero-address if unclaimed.

functions.name: claim
functions.notice: Claim an unowned name and set its owner. Implementations MUST enforce unclaimed-only or appropriate permissions.

functions.name: setOwner
functions.notice: Transfer ownership of name to newOwner. Only current owner (or policy-governed authority) may call.

functions.name: setRecord
functions.notice: Set (or overwrite) the address record for name. Only owner may call.

functions.name: getRecord
functions.notice: Fetch the current mapping for name. If not found, found=false and addr/owner are zero-values.

functions.name: removeRecord
functions.notice: Delete the record for name (owner remains). Only owner may call.

functions.name: resolve
functions.notice: Resolve name to its address. found=false when no record exists.

functions.name: setReverse
functions.notice: Optionally set reverse mapping addr -> name. Implementations may restrict to owner of name or addr.

functions.name: getReverse
functions.notice: Return reverse mapping for an address if one is set and valid.

events.name: Claimed
events.notice: Emitted when a previously unclaimed name is claimed.

events.name: OwnerChanged
events.notice: Emitted when ownership of a name changes.

events.name: RecordRemoved
events.notice: Emitted when a record is removed.

events.name: ReverseSet
events.notice: Emitted when a reverse mapping is created or updated.
